meanings.definition: The time period between morning and noon.
meanings.sent1: Forenoons are the hours before lunchtime.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the peacefulness of forenoons before the hustle and bustle of the afternoon.
meanings.sent3: During the forenoons, the birds chirp happily outside my window.
meanings.sent4: In the world of farmers, forenoons are like the calm before the storm of afternoon chores.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of forenoons lies in the gentle transition from dawn to midday.

meanings.definition: During the morning hours before noon.
meanings.sent1: She works diligently forenoons to finish her tasks early.
meanings.sent2: Forenoons are the best time for outdoor activities before the sun gets too hot.
meanings.sent3: The cat naps lazily on the porch during the forenoons.
meanings.sent4: His energy peaks forenoons, making him the most productive in the morning.
meanings.sent5: Forenoons pass quickly when you're having fun and being productive.
